CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1946, pg. 32, reads: "A Good Deal! - Larry Steele, one of the greatest producers in show business, did a magnificent job as emcee for the parade of stars." Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 16, 1947, pg. 16, reads: "Scenes From Night Of Stars - The Syria Mosque in Pittsburgh was packed to the rafters Monday night for the Frogs' 'Night of Stars.'...Left: Larry Steele, dapper master of ceremonies, starts the show off at a fast pace..."
TitMainTitle: Larry Steele talking into microphone on stage at Syria Mosque for Night of Stars
